# Interface: SendNftParams

Address with an NftId

## Table of contents

### Properties

- [address](SendNftParams.md#address)
- [nftId](SendNftParams.md#nftid)

## Properties

### address

• **address**: `string`

The Bech32 address.

___

### nftId

• **nftId**: `string`

The ID of the NFT to send.
